FuncDef: This command defines the requested segment recovery type for the gLSP path. This is the recovery capability requested by the router UNI-C to the UNI-N for recovery in segments of the optical network between ingress and egress UNI-N nodes.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the requested GMPLS segment recovery type. Values-unprotected | sbr | gr | sncp | prc.
